Articles.Content:
Your challenge is to launch a rocket carrying a payload of a floating Laythe outpost with:

  • Space for at least 7 passengers
  • Research space
  • Form of communication
  • Docking to other aircraft
  • Send another mission carrying more Kerbals to the outpost

Life support / Cargo / Inventory mods are recommended for this mission.

I built a 42 ton ocean base that fulfills all your requirements and transported it to Laythe using an SSTO:

The mission report can be found here: https://imgur.com/gallery/R9mSFnt

Unfortunately I cannot fly the ssto back to Kerbin because I forgot to add ore tanks. But I'm going to send an engineer on the next flight that can fix that using the Kerbal attachment system.
